definition: tight knot/intractable problem
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
enigmatic knot hard to untie (idiom); thorny problem/intractable difficulty

sentences.english: It is a shame that so far the central authorities have not appeared determined to unloose this Gordian knot.
sentences.chinese: 可惜，至今还未见北京中央下大决心解开这个死结。

sentences.english: The gray-brown tuft of a tail has the screwed-tight appearance of a taut knot.
sentences.chinese: 绛灰色的尾毛形若一个拧紧的死结。

sentences.english: They help when we’re performing fine motor skills, like untying knots and preparing food.
sentences.chinese: 在运动技能方面，指甲可用来解开死结，准备食物。

sentences.english: The knot which you thought a Gordian one, will untie itself before you.
sentences.chinese: 你以为是死结的乱麻，将在你面前自行理清脉络。

sentences.english: The shedder is ideal for drying wet hairs and removing dead hairs.
sentences.chinese: 该双齿钢梳是用于毛发干燥及去除死结的理想产品。

sentences.english: Deadlocks can be a particularly hard problem to debug.
sentences.chinese: 在侦错时死结可能会是个特别难处理的问题。

definition: hopeless situation/deadlock
a matter that gnaws at one's mind/preoccupation/sore point/rancor
to untie/to undo/to solve (a mystery)
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
lit. tangled skein/in a tremendous muddle/confused
hard to solve/hard to dispel/hard to understand/hard to undo
to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
Mara (the demon of temptation)
stocks and chain/in fetters
root of the trouble/cause of the ruin
variant of 解鈴還須繫鈴人|解铃还须系铃人[jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2]
pinyin: jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2

definition: to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
doubts and suspicions/a maze of doubts/puzzle/mystery
lit. whoever hung the bell on the tiger's neck must untie it (idiom)/fig. whoever started the trouble should end it
pinyin: jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2

definition: to fasten/to bind
riddle/enigma/unpredictable situation/elusive matters
